details.name: Rasheed Mudasiru
details.about: I am Rasheed I love coding and as well impacting people around me. Community building is one of my interest and I am a computer science student. I love JavaScript that is why I write Javascript and C++.

details.name: Aaron, Aniebiet B.
details.about: I'm tired of talking about myself, but if really must know; I'm a Physicist, Elon Musk is my uncle, I strongly believe in the #Mars project and arrangements have been made for me to join #Space-X after graduation.
